Home Libraries People FAQ More

basic_static_string::empty

Return if the string is empty.

Synopsis 
BOOST_STATIC_STRING_NODISCARD constexpr bool
empty() const;
Description

Returns whether the string contains no characters.

Complexity

Constant.

Return Value

size() == 0
